name: second-project
description: For this project, we need to create an interactiv webpage with a clean User-Interface for an specific client. In this occation our client is **Parota del Carmen**. This client sells wooden tables and chairs, alongside with wooden accessories. The intention is to create a webpage in which the user can review all the client inventory {Tables, Chairs, Accessories}, and the product characteristics, such as: - Product Dimensions - Available Colors - Available Pater Designs - Pricing
